mapper.sql: DELIVERYORDER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_NAME, DEALER_ID, DEALER_NAME, WAREHOUSE_ID, WAREHOUSE_NAME, DELIVERY_QUATITY, DELIVERY_COUNTS, DELIVERY_METHOD, METHOD_ID, UNIT, DELIVERY_DATE, APPLY_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, APPROVERS, APPROVE_DATE, CANCELER, CANCEL_DATE,POSITION, REMARKS
mapper.insert: insert into IPO_DELIVERYORDER (DELIVERYORDER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_NAME, DEALER_ID, DEALER_NAME, WAREHOUSE_ID, WAREHOUSE_NAME, DELIVERY_QUATITY, DELIVERY_COUNTS, DELIVERY_METHOD, METHOD_ID, UNIT, DELIVERY_DATE, APPLY_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, APPROVERS, APPROVE_DATE, CANCELER, CANCEL_DATE, POSITION, REMARKS ) values (#{deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryQuatity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{methodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{applyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{approvers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{canceler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update IPO_DELIVERYORDER set COMMODITY_ID = #{commodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMODITY_NAME = #{commodityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_ID = #{dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NAME = #{dealerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_ID = #{warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WAREHOUSE_NAME = #{warehouseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_QUATITY = #{deliveryQuatity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERY_COUNTS = #{deliveryCounts,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DELIVERY_METHOD = #{deliveryMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, METHOD_ID = #{methodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVERY_DATE = #{deliveryDate,jdbcType=DATE}, APPLY_DATE = #{applyDate,jdbcType=DATE}, APPROVAL_STATUS = #{approvalStatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, APPROVERS = #{approvers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APPROVE_DATE = #{approveDate,jdbcType=DATE}, CANCELER = #{canceler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CANCEL_DATE = #{cancelDate,jdbcType=DATE}, POSITION = #{position,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DELIVERYORDER_ID = #{deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update IPO_DELIVERYORDER set APPROVAL_STATUS = 7,CANCELER= #{canceller,jdbcType=VARCHAR},CANCEL_DATE=trunc(sysdate) where DELIVERYORDER_ID = #{deorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DELIVERYORDER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_NAME, DEALER_ID, DEALER_NAME, WAREHOUSE_ID, WAREHOUSE_NAME, DELIVERY_QUATITY, DELIVERY_COUNTS, DELIVERY_METHOD, METHOD_ID, UNIT, DELIVERY_DATE, APPLY_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, APPROVERS, APPROVE_DATE, CANCELER, CANCEL_DATE, POSITION, REMARKS from IPO_DELIVERYORDER where DELIVERYORDER_ID = #{deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select DELIVERYORDER_ID, COMMODITY_ID, COMMODITY_NAME, DEALER_ID, DEALER_NAME, WAREHOUSE_ID, WAREHOUSE_NAME, DELIVERY_QUATITY, DELIVERY_COUNTS, DELIVERY_METHOD, METHOD_ID, UNIT, DELIVERY_DATE, APPLY_DATE, APPROVAL_STATUS, APPROVERS, APPROVE_DATE, CANCELER, CANCEL_DATE, POSITION, REMARKS from IPO_DELIVERYORDER
select count(*) from IPO_DELIVERYORDER

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT FROM IPO_DELIVERYORDER T WHERE T.DELIVERY_METHOD = '自提' AND T.APPROVAL_STATUS IN (1,2,3,4) UNION SELECT FROM IPO_DELIVERYORDER T WHERE T.DELIVERY_METHOD = '在线配送' AND T.APPROVAL_STATUS IN (1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8) ) A WHERE 1=1
and A.DELIVERYORDER_ID like concat (#{record.deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and A.APPLY_DATE = #{record.applyDate,jdbcType=DATE}
and A.DEALER_ID like concat (#{record.dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_DELIVERYORDER t where t.APPROVAL_STATUS = 1 order by t.DELIVERYORDER_ID ) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select count(*) from IPO_DELIVERYORDER where APPROVAL_STATUS = 1
select from (select t.*,rownum TNO from IPO_DELIVERYORDER t where t.APPROVAL_STATUS in (1,2,3) order by t.DELIVERYORDER_ID ) a where a.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum}
select count(*) from IPO_DELIVERYORDER where APPROVAL_STATUS in (1,2,3,4,5)
SELECT SEQ_IPO_DELIVERYORDER.NEXTVAL FROM dual

select * from ( select t.*, rownum TNO from ( select p.*, d.* from IPO_PICKUP p left join IPO_DELIVERYORDER d on p.pickup_id = d.method_id where d.dealer_id = #{paging.dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DELIVERYORDER_ID like concat (concat('%',#{paging.deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and DELIVERY_METHOD = '自提' and d.approval_status = 2 ) t) c where c.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum} order by APPLY_DATE

select * from ( select t.*,rownum TNO from ( select d.*,e.* from IPO_DELIVERYORDER d left join ipo_express e on d.method_id = e.express_id where d.dealer_id = #{paging.dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DELIVERYORDER_ID like concat (concat('%',#{paging.deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') and d.DELIVERY_METHOD = '在线配送' ) t ) c where c.TNO between #{beginnum} and #{endnum} order by APPLY_DATE

select p.*,d.*,w.warehousename from IPO_PICKUP p left join IPO_DELIVERYORDER d on p.pickup_id = d.method_id left join bi_warehouse w on d.warehouse_id = w.warehouseid where d.method_id = #{methodId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and DELIVERY_METHOD = '自提'
select count(0) from IPO_DELIVERYORDER d where d.dealer_id = #{paging.dealerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DELIVERYORDER_ID like concat (concat('%',#{paging.deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select d.*,t.ADDRESS,t.COST,t.RECEIVER,t.TEL from IPO_DELIVERYORDER d left join ipo_express t on d.METHOD_ID = t.EXPRESS_ID where d.DELIVERYORDER_ID = #{delivery.deliveryorderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and d.DELIVERY_METHOD='在线配送'
and d.WAREHOUSE_ID = #{delivery.warehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select name from m_firm where firmid =#{firmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
